verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:31
verses.text: And over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagerite. All these were the rulers of the substance which was king David’s.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:32
verses.text: Also Jonathan David’s uncle was a counsellor, a wise man, and a scribe: and Jehiel the son of Hachmoni was with the king’s sons:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:33
verses.text: And Ahithophel was the king’s counsellor: and Hushai the Archite was the king’s companion:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:34
verses.text: And after Ahithophel was Jehoiada the son of Benaiah, and Abiathar: and the general of the king’s army was Joab.
